alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 17 at 6:26PM EST until January 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany County. In Virginia, Western Highland County, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Mineral and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will likely blow down scattered trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are possible. Loose outdoor objects may be blown away or damaged.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
